channel.title: CNC on 3am engineering

item.title: Ultra detailed topographic CNC carvings
item.description: This article gets too technical in places, it contains CNC, CAM, CAD, GIS terminology. To spare your time here’s the TLDR: TLDR Got really into maps and topography, wanted to make highly detailed topographic sculpts. Turns out it’s really hard and there are quite a few reasons why nobody(at least documented online) seems to have a solid working process. 6 months of trial and error, custom hardware and software, dozens of iterations, results in detailed sculps that can surpass comercial resin 3D printers.
